short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create your short link on r16.us for Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an app to create short link for regular URL like tinyurl.com. Users are allowed to create their own custom link under https://r16.us/, such as, https://r16.us/customlink. This app is to be used by Region 16 ESC employees to create short custom links to share with our customer.
